Posts.EditableText:
Hi there, quick question: how can i stop showing the room name in the status bar?

Or how can i update the status bar with the room name if I change the alias for the room?
Posts.HTML:
Hi there, quick question: how can i stop showing the room name in the status bar?

Or how can i update the status bar with the room name if I change the alias for the room?

Posts.EditableText: I have been looking at that recently. The quick answer is like this: request (UpdateLocation, "My Room") http://quest5.net/wiki/Request This is done in OnEnterRoom, and I wonder if it would be useful for OnEnterRoom to call a function to get the string to be displayed. Authors can then write their own function to display what the want on the status bar (for example, a list of available exits, or nothing at all).
Posts.HTML:
I have been looking at that recently. The quick answer is like this:

request (UpdateLocation, "My Room")

http://quest5.net/wiki/Request

Posts.EditableText:
For your first question, you can get rid of the name in the status bar with:

  [code:2leyaald]  request (Hide, "Location")[/code:2leyaald]
